features: 【New Color Design】DweIke rugs color design was done after customer preference survey. According to the results of most people's choice, the carpets in the new color feels warmer and more comfortable

【Plush Fuzzy Rugs】The fluffy rug is made of three-layer material: synthetic microfiber on the top, thick sponge in the middle, and non-woven fabric on the back, which is makes bedroom rug softer and more comfortable

【Non-slip Bottom 】The bottom of the rectangular carpet is covered with many high-density non-slip points, which help increase friction with the floor and prevent sliding.So it is very suitable for children to use in bedroom, living room, kids room

【Cute Home Decor】Colorful and fluffy soft rugs are suitable for many occasions, such as living room, bedroom, children's room and nursery. This lovely rug is made from a safe velvet material, so it's perfect for kids' and girls' rooms

【Easy to Clean】Usually only need to use a vacuum cleaner for simple cleaning.For a deeper clean, wipe with a damp cloth.The rug pack with a vacuum bag, the thickness will recover within two days, please don't worry
body.description: New carpet color design: more comfortable. 1. After investigating customers' preference for carpet colors, our carpets have been improved and launched a more comfortable color series. 2. According to the results of most people's choices, the improved carpet color provides people with a warmer and more comfortable feeling Comfortable throughout the year: Fluffy carpet suitable for winter and summer 1. Our carpet is made of superfine fiber, so it is very soft and fluffy. In summer, carpets can be used in air-conditioned rooms, and in winter, carpets can be used on the floor. Warm in winter and cool in summer, , very suitable for use in the living room and bedroom. 2. Bright colors make it very suitable for any room, such as living room, bedroom, room, dining room or people gathering space, children's room and game room, or bedroom, study and other private rooms. Create a more comfortable home environment. Anti-slip design carpet 1. There are high-density non-slip points on the back of the carpet to prevent slippage. 2. This shape greatly increases the friction between the carpet and the floor. 3. So this kind of non-slip carpet is especially suitable for families with children and pets 4. In addition, the back is non-woven fabric, which will not damage the floor of the room. Super soft and fluffy velvet material carpet 1. This soft and fluffy shag carpet is made of velvet, and the texture is silky smooth 2. Made of safe materials, very friendly to pets and children's skin Machine washable carpet, convenient to keep the carpet clean. This is a kind of carpet that can be washed in a washing machine at home. *Please use a laundry bag with mesh to wash in the washing machine. Dust-proof vacuum packaging design 1. The carpet is packed in a vacuum bag . 2. After unpacking our carpet, the wrinkles on the carpet disappear quickly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luxurious and Vibrant Addition to My Bedroom!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the DweIke Extra Large Fluffy Area Rug in Peacock Blue for my bedroom, and it has become the focal point of the entire space.This 6x9ft rug boasts a plush, high-pile design that is exceptionally soft underfoot, providing a luxurious touch that elevates the comfort level in my room. The tie-dyed pattern is not only trendy but also adds a stylish flair to the overall decor. The peacock blue hue is vibrant and eye-catching, bringing warmth and personality to my bedroom.The generous size of the rug is perfect for my bedroom, and I appreciate the exceptional quality and sturdiness. What impressed me even more was the thoughtful packaging – the rug arrived neatly rolled and secured, ensuring it laid flat without any creases. It's evident that DweIke takes great care in delivering their products in pristine condition.Placing this rug in my bedroom has not only added warmth to the space but also served as an effective soundproofing solution. The soft, plush texture helps to reduce echoes, creating a more serene and comfortable environment.Whether you're looking to refresh your bedroom or add a cozy touch to any living space, I highly recommend the DweIke Extra Large Fluffy Area Rug. It's a stylish, well-crafted piece that effortlessly combines comfort and aesthetics.In conclusion, this rug exceeded my expectations in terms of quality, design, and overall appeal. I'm genuinely delighted with my purchase and would confidently recommend it to anyone in search of a high-quality, stylish area rug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s just so fluffy!!!
reviews.reviewText: I love this rug!! I will be purchasing more for the other rooms in my house. Rug design picked is very cute, incredibly soft as well. Very high quality, I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great area rug
reviews.reviewText: Very soft and comfy, good non slip mat underneath, very easy to vacuum up. I wouldn’t say anything about machine washable because I never washed it in the machine because it was pretty big and bulky and it doesn’t seem to be flexible enough to move around freely in the washing machine. Other than that I loved it and so did my dogs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Quality is not made for long-term but for the price I just I brought a replacement when needed! Very soft and works great as a children’s library rug!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft but not padded
reviews.reviewText: If using on hard floors, I would suggest to get a rug pad under, came in a small package which threw me off but it expands a bit. Love the color and the shag is very soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute rug for the value
reviews.reviewText: Updated 12/3/22: Rug still works and serves it purpose. I did have to wash it, and had no issues. BUT, I washed on a delicate cycle with only clorox laundry sanitizer. No other detergent or fabric softener. Then I let it hang dry (do not put in dryer!) And once dried I used my hand and just "petted" the rug back to "fluffiness". Sorry, I have no other way to describe how I did this. I have used my vacuum on it, no issues there. But I was very careful and went slowly, holding down corners of the rug with my feet while I vacuumed. It still looks good, still feels good, so I am definitely happy with this purchase.Ok, so we just installed new flooring and needed an area rug until we purchased the "end game" rugs (you know, the rugs you REALLY want but haven't chose yet). So I saw this rug for about $40 and bought it as the quick fix. I got the 5x7 mottled blue and super happy with it. It has now earned a permanent place in our living room. It's not "high end" quality, but it is fluffy (give it a day in a warm, dry room and shake it out a few times) and really soft on bare feet. It is NOT machine washable. I haven't cleaned it yet (no need to... yet) but when I do, I will be spot cleaning it with a cloth and warm water only. It looks gray in a couple of my photos, I turned on the flash to show the blue color. Really, the dark is a navy blue color while the lighter is a blue/gray shade (think storm clouds). Overall, pleased with the purchase and would buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It looks beautiful and it’s soft, however, it’s smaller than advertised. I have a very small apartment so I was hoping it would cover half of the living room (that’s how small my apartment is), however it’s more like a couch footer mat. Not what I was expecting. The seller should present the actual size of their mats so no one gets their expectations too high about the size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plush and great color
reviews.reviewText: Fairly plush. It is a little thin but good value for the price.
El Color es exactamente como se anuncia es muy suave y de buena calidad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Doesn't look to good in packaging, but very pleased once opened
reviews.reviewText: Considering how the rug was packed, I was unsure how the rug would look, but after taking it out of packaging, was very pleased with rug, brilliant for washing in washer,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Beautifully soft rug, well packed on arrival and good delivery time.
Lovely texture and beautiful colour. Great size for price.
